channel.title: MySQL Help
channel.description: Hey i am having problems with MySQL I think I have done it all right but when I got to SMF and type in the details that are copied from my Cpanel it says it cannot connect with these details ? I will post a screeny if people don't already have some suggestions..I would have posted screeny already but suddenly I can' get into Cpanel when the pass and user are copied straight from the email I was sent with my details.. But anyway once it works I will post a screeny until then anyone got idea's what it could be?

item.title: MySQL Help

OK I will thoroughly read it

Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.title: MySQL Help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Make sure you are using you’re MySQL database name and password and not your username and password for your cpanel. also which host are you using?

Read full topic
